featured.text: It replays the image back through the glasses after processing it on an attached computer.
Using metal hinges, Jeanie attached one piece of the wood to the front of the cabinet door, and the second piece to the first.
He immediately rushed to his microscope and examined the burrs attached on his pants—feeling a lightbulb moment coming on.
For instance, a ventilated hard hat was developed to keep wearers cooler, and see-through face shields were attached to better see the hazards lurking above.
It swings from left to right to be attached to the cabinet door.

definition.zh_def: 附加，連接或固定某物到另一物上。
definition.en_def: To fasten, join, or connect one thing to another.
definition.example: Please attach the document to your email before sending it.
